# Add Booking Link To Google Business Profile

**URL:** https://www.mangomint.com/learn/add-booking-link-to-google-business-profile/

## Category
13 Online Booking

## Subcategory
N/A

## Article Content

HOME
ONLINE BOOKING
Add Booking Link to Google Business Profile

Adding your online booking link to your Google Business Profile can help clients easily book appointments when they search for you on Google.

To find your online booking link, open the Settings app and select Online Booking > Setup & Integration.

Once you've copied your online booking link, learn how you can add it to your Google Business Profile.

Visit the Google Business Profile Help Center to learn more about updating your Google Business Profile.

You can also watch our video to learn more about Google Business Profile and how you can ensure clients find your business when searching for your services on Google.

Can't find what you're looking for?

Start a chat with us to talk to a real person and get your questions answered, or browse our on-demand videos.
